item.description:
Looking for a casual waterview dining event? Well, why not join us at The Back Porch for a relaxing afternoon, sharing a great seafood meal with good friends.

Enjoy the succulent tastes of the gifts of the sea...or maybe you're a landlubber? Well, they have just the thing for you, as well. Check out this menu...

http://www.backporcholdsaybrook.com/dinner.html

At The Back Porch, they offer fine cuisine using the freshest local ingredients, as well as spectacular views of Saybrook Point and the Long Island Sound from their waterfront dining room. So whether you’re feasting your eyes or your palate, your experience will be delicious!

Oh yes, and music for your entertainment...on the deck...all afternoon. Enjoy the spectacular summer waterviews!!!

Come out and join us for a relaxing afternoon of great food, good friends and plenty of laughter!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Waterfront Dining At The Back Porch!
